com.oceanoptics.omnidriver.features.wavelengthcalibration

Interface WavelengthCalibrationProvider


  • public interface WavelengthCalibrationProvider
    Interface for setting the wavelength calibration coefficients for a spectrometer. Intended devices are ADC1000USB, HR4000, USB2000, QE65000, SAS, USB2000+, USB325, HR2000+, HR2000, USB650, USB4000, NIR256, NIR512

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Coefficients[] getWavelengthCalibrationCoefficients()
      Gets the wavelength calibration coefficients that the software will use for its calculations.
      double[] getWavelengths(int index)
      Gets the wavelength values stored in the spectrometer's Coefficients.
      Coefficients[] readWavelengthCalibrationCoefficientsFromSpectrometer()
      Gets the wavelength coefficients from the spectrometer.
      void setWavelengthCalibrationCoefficients(Coefficients[] coefficients)
      Sets the wavelength calibration coefficients that the software will use for its calculations.
      void setWavelengths(double[] wavelengths, int index)
      Updates the spectrometer's Coefficients with the new wavelength values.
      void writeWavelengthCoefficientsToSpectrometer(Coefficients[] coefficients)
      Writes wavelength coefficients to the EEPROM in the spectrometer

    • Method Detail

      • writeWavelengthCoefficientsToSpectrometer

        void writeWavelengthCoefficientsToSpectrometer(Coefficients[] coefficients)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Writes wavelength coefficients to the EEPROM in the spectrometer
        Parameters:
        coefficients - Coefficients stored within the spectrometer.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if errors occur communicating with the spectrometer.

      • readWavelengthCalibrationCoefficientsFromSpectrometer

        Coefficients[] readWavelengthCalibrationCoefficientsFromSpectrometer()
        Gets the wavelength coefficients from the spectrometer. These values may be cached from when the coefficients were last read.
        Returns:
        Coefficients stored within the spectrometer.

      • setWavelengthCalibrationCoefficients

        void setWavelengthCalibrationCoefficients(Coefficients[] coefficients)
        Sets the wavelength calibration coefficients that the software will use for its calculations. These will be lost when the program exits unless they are subsequently written with setCoefficientsToSpectrometer().
        Parameters:
        coefficients - Coefficients stored within the spectrometer.

      • getWavelengthCalibrationCoefficients

        Coefficients[] getWavelengthCalibrationCoefficients()
        Gets the wavelength calibration coefficients that the software will use for its calculations. These will be lost when the program exits unless they are subsequently written with setCoefficientsToSpectrometer().
        Returns:
        Coefficients stored within the spectrometer.

      • getWavelengths

        double[] getWavelengths(int index)
        Gets the wavelength values stored in the spectrometer's Coefficients.
        Parameters:
        index - the channel index.
        Returns:
        an array of doubles containing the wavelength values.

      • setWavelengths

        void setWavelengths(double[] wavelengths,
                    int index)
        Updates the spectrometer's Coefficients with the new wavelength values.
        Parameters:
        wavelengths - an array of doubles containing the wavelength values.
        index - the channel index.
